title: Al-Shabab Club Stadium - Wikipedia
snippet: Al-Shabab Club Stadium (Arabic: ملعب نادي الشباب) branded as SHG Arena for sponsorship reasons is a football stadium in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. It is the home ground of Al-Shabab Club. The stadium was built and opened in 1984, and was mostly used by Al-Shabab as a training ground ...

title: Al-Shabab FC - Stadium - Al-Shabab Club Stadium | Transfermarkt
snippet: Stadium: Al-Shabab Club Stadium 15.000 Seats · Current transfer record: +-0 · + Al-Shabab FC · Al-Shabab FC U23 (- 2022) Al-Shabab FC U19 · This page provides you with information about the stadium of the selected club.

title: Al Shabab Club - Wikipedia
snippet: Al-Shabab Saudi Football Club also known as Al-Shabab (Arabic: نادي الشباب لكرة القدم, romanized: nādī al-shabaab li-kurat al-qadam, lit. 'The Youth Football Club') is a Saudi Arabian professional football club based in Riyadh that competes in the Saudi Pro League.

title: Al-Shabab Club Stadium – StadiumDB.com
snippet: Stadium: Al-Shabab Club Stadium, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, capacity: 15000, club: Al-Shabab FC.
